reuters.title: MOODY'S MAY DOWNGRADE IRVING BANK CORP, AFFECTS 950 MLN DLRS OF DEBT
reuters.body: Bankers Trust Co said it is raising its broker loan rate to 7-1/2 pct from 7-1/4 pct, effective immediately. U.S. Trust Co, the only other bank to publicize its broker rate, was already posting 7-1/2 pct. Reuter 
